data.name: Hovercars 3077: Underground Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz or AMD a10 7850k
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported all resolutions (21:9, UltraWide etc.)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported all resolutions (21:9, UltraWide etc.)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported all resolutions (21:9, UltraWide etc.)
